conclusion: Preliminary objections rejected (non-exhaustion of domestic remedies, estoppel);Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF STRAN GREEK REFINERIES AND STRATIS ANDREADIS v. GREECE - [Georgian Translation]
